mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address (user_id, recipient_name, phone, province, city, district, detailed_address, is_default) VALUES (#{userId}, #{recipientName}, #{phone}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{detailedAddress}, #{isDefault})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM address WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM address WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM address WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_default DESC, update_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET is_default = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_default = 1
UPDATE address SET is_default = 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
